reviewText: well what can i say that hasn't already been said about Mr. Vorlander, his work is solid stuff this movie will expose you to a krafty movie indeed! and the collaboration with mr. schaffe is cool also, i would give this movie 10/10 a must see movie, buy it now!!!!!

Absolutely rubbish. It looks like this was directed by a five year old.
The old ladies in it are supposed to be sexy? EWWWW. They were all repellent creatures.

This is an awful movie, with an awful director. Should come with a rubbish warning. I didn't know if I was watching a cheapo mafia movie, a drug movie, or a homemade eastern european porn with only wrinkly skin on show. If thats the case it should be considered beastiality.

The product description says its the most talked about movie of the decade. Erm, no its not.

It also says "banned, panned, condemned". Well all three are at least true. Banned in some countries because it uses copyrighted footage. Panned by everyone who has seen it, and no I am not including the fake reviews the production team has started posting on here. And condemned, well, because it flippin' well should be!

Lets face it, Marc Vorlander couldn't direct his way out of a paper bag. He should find another career - fast food restaurant or something.
Bizarre mixture of arthouse, silent, comic, porn and horror. A love or hate affair with a stunning soundtrack. Don't expect a straight sequel to Showgirls, it's rather an odd persiflage of it.

This is really crazy and eye-popping hot stuff. It's so funny how the first one is reduced to it's elements: colors, nudity, great imagery and the soundtrack is even better here. It's going to be a cult classic 100%. The tagline on the DVD cover: "Disturbing. Provoking. Completely Shaved."... true!! I love it!!
